trans-unit.source: Specifies the action that occurs when a workflow becomes idle when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Angir handlingen som skjer når en arbeidsflyt blir inaktiv når utholdenhet er tillatt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> function is invoked when the scheduler has no more pending work items and the workflow runtime can persist.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>funksjonen aktiveres når scheduler har ingen flere ventende arbeidselementer og kjøretiden arbeidsflyten kan gjøre.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> function is invoked when persistence is not allowed, and both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> are invoked in that order when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at den <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>funksjonen aktiveres når utholdenhet ikke er tillatt, og begge <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>og <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>startes i denne rekkefølgen når utholdenhet er tillatt.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>

trans-unit.source: None is the default action if no <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> handler is provided.
Specifies that no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ingen handling ble utført.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should persist the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Angir at det <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> arbeidsflyten skal gjøre.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should persist and unload the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Angir at det <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> bør beholde og laste arbeidsflyten.
